评论详情: My friend had this outfit on when we meet at the airport for a 2 week long trip.  I loved how nice the fabric felt and how classy it looked on her. She told me how comfortable it was and easy to travel in. (She owns the black one.) I wanted to order one as soon as I got home to try even though I am quite a bit taller than she is, i just couldn’t get over how sleek and  classy it looked!  So when I got home, I ordered mine in this pretty pink.  Love the color!!!!When it came in, I was so excited to try it on and boy was she right about how comfortable It is to wear.  I love the fact that it doesn’t wrinkle easily either and It fit me perfectly!She wore hers more than once on that trip we were on. The outfit looked just as nice the second time she wore it as it did the first time that she wore it. It fits to size and is a fantastic value for the price.  I HIGHLY recommend this outfit to everyone.  It is an outfit that looks great on all sizes and shapes. You can dress it up or down depending on the occasion.  One of the best purchase I have made this past year!  I plan on buying at least one or two different colors.

I’m obsessed with this little lounge set! The material is thin but not see through (I bought the light beige color), its coloring is true to the pictures, and it fits true to size. It does show every line (including the pockets underneath), so be mindful of what you wear as undergarments. It’s incredibly comfortable and feels like pajamas but definitely looks cute enough to wear out and about which is what I was looking for!

评论概述: Soft fabric, but the waistband is not ideal
评论详情: This is a nice set, the fabric is soft and thin but still hangs well. I do not love the waistband. It is thin with a drawstring. Wish it had a thicker waistband, more stretch or yoga style. The top does hang down far enough to cover the waist, but the ties can still be seen unless you tuck them. I am going to keep the set because the fabric and cute capri length of the pants are lovely. Great for warmer weather and cold weather with a layer.

I bought this set for the main purpose of traveling, and it did not disappointed. Absolutely comfortable, first use was on a 10 hours flight to Greece, and it was perfect. It looks cute, I was able to accommodate on my flight seat very nicely due to the stretchiness of the fabric, it’s thick but not hot, and the pockets are very handy when traveling. While on my 3 weeks trip,  I washed it and it washed perfectly, I wanted to use it again on my returning back home flight, 17 hours from Turkiye. The only drawback I have to say about this set is that I bought a light color and that’s not the best option when traveling.  I will order another set in a darker color.
This was such a super surprise!  The fabric feels like butter and yet very substantial, not thin.  It is made well and is true to size.  Super trendy!  I will be purchasing more in different colors!

It's really what you see in the pic. All polyester, which I expected, the fabric is fairly soft, like has the fuzzy stuff inside. It's warm, I got it to wear on a flight, and it was perfect for that. It fits like the photo, though, the legs are short, like above the ankle bone. So they are kind of like wide leg, highwater pants vs a capri, but not really full length. If it wasn't for the weird length, I'd probably wear it all the time.

I love this travel outfit!  It feels like pjs but makes me look put together which is so nice when I'm spending hours in the car.  The material does not feel cheap and has some stretch to it.  I'm between a med and a lg in size, about a size in 10, and I went up a size to a large, and it fits great!Will definitely be buying in more colors!

I received many compliments on this. I love that it has pockets. I don't like how it snags easily, but I'm still going to order another set because it looks elegant and classy without looking too dressed up, and it is so comfortable. To help you with estimating the right size to order I am 5'2", 148 lbs. The pants are a little short, that's probably the style. I just like my pants hem right below my ankle.

评论概述: Set is so soft, affordable, & versatile
评论详情: The SAMPEEL lounge set is incredibly comfortable and well-suited for lounging or casual outings. The wide-leg crop pants provide ample room for movement and have a flattering fit that complements most body types. They aren’t too tight around the waist, and the elastic waistband allows for some flexibility without feeling restrictive. The mock neck top has a slightly loose, relaxed fit, making it comfortable for all-day wear without feeling too tight around the neck or shoulders. This set is perfect for warm weather, as the fabric is breathable and lightweight.  Style and Versatility:  The mock neck design of the top adds a trendy and slightly formal touch to what would otherwise be a casual lounge set. This makes it versatile—whether you’re wearing it at home, running errands, or dressing it up with accessories for a casual brunch. The wide-leg pants hit just above the ankle, giving the outfit a stylish, modern cropped look. The minimalistic design allows you to pair the set with different shoes (sneakers, sandals, or even flats) to create various looks.  Fabric Quality:  The material of the SAMPEEL lounge set feels soft to the touch. It strikes a nice balance between lightweight and durable, making it perfect for summer wear. The fabric holds up well after washing, and there’s no noticeable shrinkage or fading, which is always a concern with lighter fabrics. However, it’s worth noting that while the fabric is soft and comfortable, it is somewhat thin. For those who prefer a thicker material, this might feel a bit light, but it’s perfect for those hot summer days.  Practicality:  One of the biggest advantages of this set is its practicality. It’s easy to wear, with no zippers or buttons to fuss over. The elastic waistband makes the pants easy to slip on, and the whole outfit feels effortlessly stylish. It also packs well if you’re traveling, as the fabric doesn’t wrinkle much, making it a great option for vacation wear or weekend getaways.  Cons:  • Sheerness: Some users may find the fabric slightly sheer, especially in lighter colors. It’s not overly transparent but might require neutral-colored undergarments to avoid visibility. • Length: The cropped pants might not hit the same length on everyone, depending on height. Taller individuals may find the pants hit higher on the leg than expected, while shorter people might need to hem them for the right look.  Overall, the SAMPEEL Two Piece Set is a great choice for anyone looking for a comfortable yet stylish outfit for summer. It’s breathable, versatile, and easy to dress up or down. The only minor drawback is the thinness of the fabric, which may or may not be an issue depending on personal preferences. If you’re looking for a relaxed, chic summer outfit, this lounge set is a fantastic option that blends comfort with effortless style.

just as described. comfortable for traveling. fit is great. i am 5'3", 160 lb. and the large was a perfect fit. i did return though because the mock turtleneck was not flattering for my face.  i would buy this same outfit if it had a v-neck or zip neck.

This is very comfortable and packs well for traveling.  It is more flattering than a lot of sets I have purchased. It does show stains easily. This is the inly reason I didnt get another set in another color.  I have the tan color.

评论概述: This is the cutest outfit! Great for travel!
评论详情: It doesn’t wrinkle and is professional enough that u can wear it on a plane on the way to a business meeting. Throw a little sweater over it for the plane ride. Cute while checking into the hotel and not look like you are wearing a jogging suit.

I absolutely love this outfit, but sadly I had to return it as it was a bit too big for me. If it came in a size smaller I would 100% order!!!! The material feels thick and good quality and it is extremely comfortable. Would definitely recommend
Great for travel. Easy to dress up or down.
The set is nice and comfortable. The neck is a bit odd but no it enough to keep me from wearing it. I love the pants.

My sister-in-law got this for Christmas and I thought it looked so adorable that I ordered one, went back and ordered a second color, and had my mom order one. Great price, stylish but simple. And the fabric is incredibly soft - can't wait for it to be warm outside to wear it.

Incredible leisure fit. While I did not keep it for myself, I wish I could have. This is a thick, streching and flattering material that is to die for. However, I am super selfconcious about my arms and wearing sleeveless tops is not my thing. This would make an incredible carpool/travel/errands outfit. It’s very much a spanx dupe with a fabulous pricepoint

OMGosh this is the first time I ordered clothes online This is beautiful, silky, comfortable great material. Easy to wear you can dress it up or go casual! I purchased the black and steel blue color. Wearing the Black with pearls and heels!! True size!

I’m 5 ft 145 pounds. The size chart said it would fit me but it was too big. I have to return and get the next size smaller highly recommend nice fabric. Cute outfit will buy again.

I love the feel of this item! The material is so smooth feels really nice on the skin.  I have purchased 3 different colors XL.  The fit is just right, I’m a size 12-14.  I would suggest to be careful with jewelry that may snag.  This is a great piece for the price.

I really love this set.  The fabric is soft, and does not appear to wrinkle (none straight out of the package).It's also versatile.  Can be work with sneakers or heels.  And about anywhere.  Will buy more in the future.

I love this outfit!  Amazon says it’s frequently returned item, but I’m not sure why!!  Soft fabric and fits great!  Can’t wait to take it to Florida in a few weeks.  Going to buy another color for summer. . I’m 5’9”, 125 and a small coffee color fits perfect!
Super soft t-shirt like material with a really great fit. Not too thin. Great for errands or weekend brunches!!

Fabric is soft and comfortable. This is my second set. Now have black and cream.
Love this!  So soft!  I ordered another set in a different color!
Such a great color! Wonderful fit! Soft fabric! Will be ordering another set!!!

I originally ordered it in a small and returned it and ordered a medium, because the top ran small. It washes well in cold water. I hung mine to dry and it did not shrink.  Size Medium; black

If this is not the case for you I recommend a darker color, which is what I may do.
Very true to size. I'm 5'4" and 165 pounds. I ordered a large and it's a perfect fit. Perfect weight for an early spring cruise.

I bought this to wear on a cruise.  Originally, I thought I'd just wear this as sweats; however, I actually wore this to dinner.  It's versatile.  I'm 5'7" 130 lbs and 34DD.  My only complaint is that the top fits more like a small in the arm holes.
Awesome little set. So comfortable and soft, fit great.
But I like it. Ordering other colors.

评论概述: Very soft material, top is a bit short
评论详情: I loved the fabric of this set! The top is a little more cropped than expected even with my short torso and seems to run smaller than the pants. I got a size small but would have liked to size up to a medium for the top. If I had done that the pants would be too large. Overall, it was a great airplane travel outfit!

Took this set to Europe with me in hopes to use it alone as a set, and with multiple outfits. It’s really comfortable and flattering, but once I washed it, I noticed some pilling in the fabric. The pants do run a little short, and I tend to have short legs when ordering pants. I still wore this outfit twice & a French man even catcalled me in it lol. I’ll continue to wear it, as it was really comfortable & it can be so versatile. Just be aware that the fabric will pill and the pants are shorter in length! I ordered true to size and I’d say it fit that way (other than the length of the pants). There was also no noticeable shrinkage in the wash!
I love ❤️ it .. great material and very comfortable suit 💋💋

So comfortable and easy to take care of. The material is nice and soft. I am 5'51/2 an weight 150. I wear the large the medium fit but was tighter than I like around my bottom. I loved this so much I got it in another color. I know own the lavender and the lt blue. The material is so soft. Love that it has pockets too. I got lots of compliments. Great fit. Loved the look but hard to get out the wrinkles. Material was soft
The pants and top are very soft and comfortable. They are my go to airport and travel outfit.

I really like this! I bought it for traveling and ended up wearing it on Thanksgiving and then I walked for over an hour. It’s very versatile and comfortable. I am tall and wear xxl, it’s so comfortable and soft.

It’s a cute outfit. I loved the shade of blue and the feel of the fabric. But it just wasn’t flattering on my shape. I returned it, wishing I had a body like the model in the picture, but knowing it never was, and never will be. On to the next clothing adventure!

I'm 5'9, 200lbs, 38-33-42. I have the build of someone who used to be athletic but likes cookies for reference haha! I order the size large.  I was expecting this to be oversized as the pictures showed, but it was more snug than I wanted. Maybe I need an XL or an XXL to get the oversized fit (I usually wear L at Old Navy for reference).  It's cute and the material feels very nice, it's just a very fitted outfit! I wanted a cute set I could wear for international flight travel where I can be comfy but still put together and cute, but this set is too snug to be comfy. It feels like a petite set! I think I'm going to return this and try a bigger size, but I'm afraid the pants will just get longer but won't get baggier in the butt and thighs, the the top will just get wider and not longer

Soft, comfortable and cool and my husband complimented me on it. Got it in the brown for our warm fall. I have a terrible time due to surgeries and chemotherapy with any pants made in China specifically from Amazon because the elastic waist is always one to two sizes too small and tight compared to buying in a regular store made in China items. Often a medium, which I take, feels like an extra small in the waist cutting into my skin. At the advice of another buyer I purchased the extra large and while it fit perfectly and comfortably I could have gotten away with a regular large, which is closer to a US medium when I compare it and hold it up to true size made clothing like my pants from Anthropologie. I’m 155 and 5’4 if that helps anyone and you are sensitive to this waist issue too. When the top is tucked in it looks like a cute one piece jumper too without all the trouble of one.

This is so cute and so comfortable. I did size up and love the way it fits.

Soft fabric, light weight, drapes nicely, and has perfect amount of stretch. I'm 5'-3", 138#, wear a 34DDD and the small is just right. It hits at my ankles. It is a thicker material so it keeps you warm but not to overheating(wasn’t bad with the hot flashes). Fits great. Definitely worth every penny. I also love the deep pockets.
